attributes.action: force the banks pass on complete rate cuts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The banks have been given a lifeline from the pocket of the very people it calls customers. Therefore, the PM should force the banks to pass on the complete rate cuts in order to ensure we are not being robbed on 2 fronts, tax used to bail out banks and interest paid to them. They caused the problems yet they get the help. Its simply unfair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
